content.rendered:
Directed by Rajesh Pillai.

Written by Bobby. Suresh Nair. Piyush Mishra. Prashant Pandey.

Cast Manoj Bajpayee(Godbole). Jimmy Shergill(Commissioner Gurbir Singh). Divya Dutta(Maya Kapoor). Parambrata Chattopadhyay(Dr. Abel (as Parambrata Chatterjee)). Prasenjit Chatterjee(Dev Kapoor). Sachin Khedekar(Rehan’s Father). Kitu Gidwani(Rehan’s Mother). Amol Parashar(Rajeev). Raj Arjun(Aslam bhai). Vikram Gokhale(Dr. Simon D’souza). Nikhita(Rehan’s Girlfriend). Richa Panai(Dr. Abel’s Wife). Vishal Singh(Rehan). Jishnu(Hemaan). Divya Unny(Mrs. Godbole). Talib Mehdi(MP Sanjay Jog).Shailesh Shankar Kulkarni

Language Hindi.

Producers Prasanna R. Coondapur. Deepak Dhar. Sameer Gogate. Ram Mirchandani. Sameer Rajendran. Janeshwar Shukla. Venkat.

Production Fox STAR Studios.
